@graph.name: Vegan Strawberry Galette (No Oil)
@graph.description: Easy Vegan Strawberry Galette with a crisp crust, lime zest and topped with whipped coconut cream! Just 10 Ingredients! No Oil. Vegan Soyfree Recipe, can be made nut-free, gluten-free

video.name: VEGAN STRAWBERRY GALETTE No Oil | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2019/08/vegan-strawberry-galette-no-oil.html
MY BOOKS: Indian Kitchen: https://www.veganricha.com/vrik
Everyday Kitchen: https://www.veganricha.com/vrek

A Simple Crust, seasonal berries, baked and served with whipped coconut cream. Enough said!

This Slice of summer comes together quickly with a few ingredients. Mix up the flour with salt, sugar, baking soda, then add coconut cream to make crumbs. Then bring it together using some coconut milk and roll it out. Ripe plump strawberries are thinly sliced and added to the crust. add some lime zest, fold and bake. The strawberries roast and get jammy because of their liquid during baking and the crust holds all that juicyness in.

The crust if rustic and crisp. For a more pie like crust, add 2-3 tbsp oil or softened vegan butter with the coconut cream. This tart is easy and so delicious! For gluten-free option see, recipe notes. Lets make it!

Music: Sky by Markvard
#vegan #veganrecipe #veganfood #strawberrygalette #veganricha

recipeIngredient: 1 cup + 2 tbsp whole wheat pastry flour (, or use half all purpose and half whole wheat* ,(see note for glutenfree))

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the dry ingredients for the crust in a bowl, until well combined. Add coconut cream and mix in using a fork. ** Then add in half of the coconut milk and mix until fat crumbs. Knead into a stiff dough. Add 1-2 tsp of coconut milk as needed during kneading to make a dough. Do not overwork. Let the dough sit for 5 mins. Preheat the oven to 350 deg F (180 C)
recipeInstructions.name: Mix the dry ingredients for the crust in a bowl, until well combined. Add coconut cream and mix in using a fork. ** Then add in half of the coconut milk and mix until fat crumbs. Knead into a stiff dough. Add 1-2 tsp of coconut milk as needed during kneading to make a dough. Do not overwork. Let the dough sit for 5 mins. Preheat the oven to 350 deg F (180 C)

recipeInstructions.text: Using flour, shape the dough into a somewhat smooth ball, then press to make a disc. Place disc on parchment or a marble surface and Roll it out evenly to 14 inch oval.
recipeInstructions.name: Using flour, shape the dough into a somewhat smooth ball, then press to make a disc. Place disc on parchment or a marble surface and Roll it out evenly to 14 inch oval.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the rolled out dough on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the rolled out dough on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle 1 tbsp sugar on the crust. Add the sliced strawberries and spread them evenly leaving about an inch from the edge.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle 1 tbsp sugar on the crust. Add the sliced strawberries and spread them evenly leaving about an inch from the edge.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle lime zest and 1 tbsp sugar. Squeeze the zested half of the lime. Brush water or coconut milk on the crust edges, then carefully fold over. Brush oil on the crust for crispier(optional).
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle lime zest and 1 tbsp sugar. Squeeze the zested half of the lime. Brush water or coconut milk on the crust edges, then carefully fold over. Brush oil on the crust for crispier(optional).

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 350 deg F (180 C) for 45 mins. Remove from the oven and let sit for 5 mins. Slice and serve with whipped coconut cream or ice cream. Garnish with more lime zest or mint
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 350 deg F (180 C) for 45 mins. Remove from the oven and let sit for 5 mins. Slice and serve with whipped coconut cream or ice cream. Garnish with more lime zest or mint
